revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Asus PCE-AC66 001.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 802.11ac Dual-band Wireless-AC1750 PCI-E Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Adapters/PCEAC66/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = ASUS_PCE-AC66 |wikipedia = |brand = ASUS |model = PCE-AC66 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = A1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/02/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_PCE-AC66 |sernum = |wlclass = AC1750 |series = |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = single-lane |vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 43a0 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = MSQ-PCEAC66 |icid = 3568A-PCEAC66 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 50:46:5D, 60:A4:4C |chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 1300 |802.11n = 450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WN8222BAC |manuf_rev = ASU |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/03/2012 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 886227293902 |ean = 4716659293903 |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B009YCGHB6 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [http://www.asus.com/News/rZcy4jXiQPQ5F8YL/ '''ASUS''' News] The ASUS logo, "PCE-AC66", and "REV: 1.40" is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos. The device is also pictured with an extremely large heatsink :in these photos. This card is 3x3:3 for both 802.11ac (max. 1300Mbps PHY rate) :and 2.4GHz/5GHz 802.11n (max. 450Mbps PHY rate). The internal ''[[Arcadyan]]'' model name for the device appears :to be WN8222BAC-ASU (or maybe WN6222BAC-ASU). ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/131-asus-pce-ac66.html Review on '''FoxNetwork'''] :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4360 BCM4360KMLG] (3T3R 802.11abgn+ac) :OUI: 50:46:5D ==Pictures==
'''FCCID {{fccid|MSQ-PCEAC66}}''' File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC external 1.jpg|external, top File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC external 2.jpg|external, bottom File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC top hs on.jpg|card top, heatsink on File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC top hs off shield on.jpg|card top, heatsink off File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC top hs off BCM4360 closeup.jpg|BCM4360 closeup File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC top hs off shield off.jpg|card top, heatsink and shield off File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC back.jpg|card back File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC single antenna.jpg|dual-band antenna File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC partial side.jpg|partial side view File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC label.jpg|sample label File:ASUS PCE-AC66 FCC label loc diff.jpg|label location, clearly a different revision
[[Has images::fcc| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== ===Drivers=== The driver provided by '''ASUS''' lists numerous devices which are :presumed to be 802.11ac capable. They are below... *14e4:43a0 (PCI ID of the BCM4360 used by the ASUS PCE-AC66, : and the [[ASUS PCE-AC68]]) *14e4:43a1 *14e4:43a2 *14e4:43b1 (passys states that this is the ID.. but it seems :to be used by the BCM4352 based [[ASUS PCE-AC56]]) *14e4:43b2 *14e4:43b3 *14e4:4360 
BCM4360_D11AC_ID	0x43a0    /* 4360 802.11ac dualband */
BCM4360_D11AC2G_ID	0x43a1    /* 4360 802.11ac 2.4G device */
BCM4360_D11AC5G_ID	0x43a2    /* 4360 802.11ac 5G device */
BCM4352_D11AC_ID	0x43b1    /* 4352 802.11ac dualband */
BCM4352_D11AC2G_ID	0x43b2    /* 4352 802.11ac 2.4G device */
BCM4352_D11AC5G_ID	0x43b3    /* 4352 802.11ac 5G device */
BCM43602_D11AC_ID	0x43ba    /* ac dualband PCI devid SPROM */
BCM43602_D11AC2G_ID	0x43bb    /* 43602 802.11ac 2.4G device */
BCM43602_D11AC5G_ID	0x43bc    /* 43602 802.11ac 5G device */
BCM4356_D11AC_ID	0x43ec    /* 4356 802.11ac dualband */
BCM4356_D11AC2G_ID	0x43ed    /* 4356 802.11ac 2.4G device */
BCM4356_D11AC5G_ID	0x43ee    /* 4356 802.11ac 5G device */
[[Category:English Documentation]]
